DOC.brief_title: Evaluation CooperVision Avaira Toric ( Enfilcon A ) Soft Contact Lens When Compared Acuvue Advance Toric Soft Contact Lens
DOC.criteria: Prior consider eligible participate study , subject MUST : Be least 18 year age date evaluation study . Have read Informed Consent , give explanation Informed Consent , indicate understanding Informed Consent , sign Informed Consent document . Be willing able adhere instruction set forth protocol able keep specified appointment . Be adapt , current fulltime silicone hydrogel soft contact lens wearer . An adapted fulltime wearer define wear contact lenses eye daily basis least 8 hour per day least one month prior participation study . Possess wearable visually functional eyeglass . Be good general health , base his/her knowledge . Require spectacle lens power 1.00 6.00 diopter sphere 2.00 diopter refractive astigmatism willing wear contact lenses eye . Have : manifest refraction Snellen visual acuity ( VA ) equal good 20/25 eye . Upon complete fit process lens wear study , contact lens Snellen VA equal well 20/30 eye . Subjects may enrol study follow apply : The subject is/has : Wearing lens monovision modality unwilling fit distance lenses eye . NOTE : Subjects may wear lens monovision modality time study interfere visual acuity analysis . Poor personal hygiene . Any active participation another clinical trial within 30 day prior study . Currently pregnant ( best subject 's knowledge ) , lactate planning pregnancy within study period . A member , relative household member investigator investigational office staff . Has know sensitivity ingredient use care product approve use study . Previous refractive surgery ; current previous orthokeratology treatment . Is aphakic psuedophakic . Ocular systemic disease , limited : anterior uveitis iritis ( past present ) , glaucoma , Sj√∂gren 's syndrome , lupus erythematosus , sclerodermia , keratoconus type II diabetes . The need topical ocular medication medication might interfere contact lens wear would require lens remove day . The presence clinically significant ( grade 3 4 ) anterior segment abnormality . Any ; inflammation iritis ; infection allergic reaction eye , lid , associate structure . A known history corneal hypoesthesia ( reduced corneal sensitivity ) , corneal ulcer , corneal infiltrates fungal infection . A history papillary conjunctivitis interfere contact lens wear . Slit lamp finding would contraindicate contact lens wear , include limited : Pathological dry eye associate dry eye symptom decrease tear level punctuate stain > Grade 2 , Pterygium , Corneal scar within visual axis , Neovascularization ghost vessel > 1.0 mm limbus , Giant papillary conjunctivitis ( GPC ) > Grade 1 , Anterior uveitis iritis , Seborrheic eczema , seborrheic conjunctivitis blepharitis To eligible randomized study product subject must ALL Inclusion Criteria NONE exclusion criterion present . To eligible lens dispense ( either Test Control ) , subject 's study lens contact lens visual acuity must equal good 20/30 eye .
